name: NATIONAL INDUSTRIAL HEMP COUNCIL
description: Industry association for the hemp industry.
sampleDescriptions: HR 841 Hemp and Hemp-Derived CBD Consumer Protection and Market Stabilization Act of 2021. Seeking to get CBD access to the market as both a food and supplement.
Ensuring that all hemp businesses have equal access to banking services. Supporting S S 910 and HR 1996.
